description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. QuadTrix is a fun and relaxing puzzle game. Rotate colored triangles scattered across the grid into its matching column in the least number of moves. Complete a column to earn points and additional time. But be careful! Breaking a column or going over the move limit will take a chunk out of those hard-earned points. Think you can solve the scrambled puzzles the most logical way? Play and find out!
